page.title: 13Children's clubs -Dovercourt
page.content: There are plenty of clubs and societies in Dovercourt for children to join. For the girls (and a few boys) there are dancing classes. These include classes in ballet,tap,ballroom and modern dancing. Children can take examinations and also take part in an annual show where certificates and prizes are presented. Many boys enjoy martial arts courses and eagerly participate in judo and karate classes. There is a good athletics club which encourages children's skill and interest in sport. Since the opening of the new indoor swimming pool many children have joined the swimming club to improve their swimming skills and take part in swimming galas.There are also Brownie Packs and Cub Scout packs
